idea:
TAXOSMART LLP

Tax-O-Smart is a technology platform to simplify legal and business related matters. We are committed to helping start ups and small business owners in solving legal and tax compliance related to starting and running their business.

The Current Major Softwares of Tax-O-Smart are;

 TDS-O-Smart (TDS Software)

 GST Smart (GST Reconciliation Software)

 Smart Invoice (GST Invoice, Accounting & Inventory Management Web App)

 Smart e-Verification (Investment Proof Verification (of Employees) Web App)

TaxOSmart has been founded by a team of IIT Graduates, Chartered Accountants and Management consultants. The founders are alumnus of top education institutions like IIT & IIM and have professional experience with top consulting firms such as Mckinsey, Bain & Company, EnY, etc.

TaxOSmart currently has a network of 100+ professionals including experienced Chartered Accountants, Company Secretaries, Lawyers, Cost Accountants, Chartered Engineers and Bankers.
name: TAXOSMART LLP
